content:
Professional Activities

  • Certified in Basic Mediation by the State of California

  • Expert witness in

    • practices of programmers and the software industry
    • contract and intellectual property issues related to software systems
    • forensic analysis of storage media

  • Reviewer of computer science textbook manuscripts

  • Consultant to the UCI Visual Resources Collection in the UC Irvine Claire Trevor School of the Arts

  • Typographer and copyeditor for An Encyclopedia of Egyptian Pharoahs, by Darrell Baker, published by Bannerstone Press.
